name: keyword_research_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seo_keyword_research.
Tool description: Keyword Research helps to analyze keywords and related keywords competitions , search volume (google) and CPC. For private plans, custom plans, custom billing contact : info@getecz.com
API description: Fetch keyword research data from the SEO Keyword Research API via RapidAPI.

keyword.description: The keyword for which to perform the research.

country.description: The country code to limit the keyword research to a specific country.
